I'll give it to you
I know what you want
You know I got it
Baby if you give it to me
I'll give it to you
I know what you want
You know I got it
~ busta rhymes "I know what yuo want"

really digging this song right now ^_^
decided I want to cahnge my LJ for no real reason ^_^ sense Im not trying to avoid anyone everyone can update their friends list who wish ^_^ "jax_girl_babs"
he jsut ask me to dinner!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! this is the FIRST time a guy asked me to dinner!

ok so like I ahev an upstairs apartment... adn 3 days ago i came home to the tiles for my shower knocked out! there was a note left from mintinace.... they show up an hour later saying it was leaking water down stairs...

ok so today there FINALLY working on it (as I speak no less) adn omg! this one guy is hot! His name is brad... hes 27. tehre are down sides... he technically lives in ga >< and he has kids ><>< BUT! hes single and hes interested in "metting" people and "hanging out" ^_^... lets see what happens shall we??

god I HATE vacation and holidays! well only the part when there over >< I mean I get into teh habbit of work, wakeing up, ddaily routine, then its interuppted by a vacation or a holiday, and everything gets out of whack. 

I WANT TO SLEEP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Ok im gonna start with this year 9to date) and work my way back as far as I can, listing out 1-2 songs that sums the year up in relation to my life.

2003~ "not the girl" rachel farris, "feel good" system of a down and kitty
2002~ "survivor" destiny child
2001~ "you otta know" alanis moreset "graduation" vitamin c
2000~"running down a dream" tom petty, 
1999~ "dream" cranberries
1998~"happy boys happy girls" aqua, 
1997~ "anthem" blink 182

went through all my highschool/jr high pictures adn hfolders. im not going to attempt the letters now. I did this with vitamin c's song on repeat. Im like sooo sad. sooo much has changed. half the peopel I dont talk to due to them cutting ties, or me cutting ties. I have a notepad bran agve me jr year. I had all sorts of people sign, describe themselfs, first impression of me, now impression, and more about them. I saw referanses to my fashion design career, my highschool sweet heart, people who call me friend, yet i dont talk to. people I call friend and they dont talk to me. 

did anyone follow their "dreams"? there was this one day in 10th grade... the lunch table I sat at was like teh "UN" of social ciclres, we had the prep, goth, hick, wiger, dork, nerd, shy, ghetto.... anyways, one day we worked all our plans and dreams togthor so we would alwasy be togthor... lol we knew then it wouldnt happen, but I still recall that day.

seesm alot of the girls got pregnant/married. the guys went military. some moved to out of state collages, others died. 

I recall the sensation I had, walking in the hallways, headset blaring over my ear, small talk to people in teh halls. gossip at the lockers, tehn teh ladysroom. showing up in class jsut in time or a few min late. I felt surreal, yet right. 

looking back i see things diffrently. I lok at my pics then and I see how pretty was 9ok still am but i was soooo pretty in highschool) yet I didnt believe so then. I let many oppertunities slip by. 

the dreams I ahd then, are what I dont want now. 

the firends I had tehm, all but a couple are gone from my life. 

ok ok enough on that trail of thought.
me and rachel went to lizs porn and chicken party. Not sure about everyone else, but I had a blast ^_^

wow I jsut got approved for a bank of america platnumcard with 6 months 0% and $2500 limit...

its not a high prime card... its a regualr credit card, with a kown bank, and quite a bit of money. damn. i need to order all 3 of my CBRs to see what my score is and what aol has and hasnt reported....

in other news I ahd a blast last night. good ol times with rachel. we went on spy missions! we had our own them music and everything. saved the world a couple times over (not to brag ^_^) 

ok what really happen was were were bored so we got into her car, grabed food, sodas and stuff tehn picked random cars and follwed them to see where they were going and if they cought onto being followed. onyl one figured it out, it was a motorcycle driver, as he made a sudden left hand turn he jerked his head around twards us and stred... lol it was greaet! we woudl of gone mojoing (driving by groups of people and yelling) but i lost my voice when singing who let the dogs out >< so yeah....

today im going to my parents place. then tomorrwo im going to pixies party. going to be a blast. rachle said if my expectant ride sitches me or cant go themselfs, then shell hook me up... so im there! Ill be missing the toga party at plush... but hell ill have a funner time in tampa anyways.

ooh speaking of fun... yesturday I actually hung out with coworkers AFTER work. we went to Gators... same place that tried to rip brand off with her credit card # ^^" but that girl was fired/ arrested im sure. anyways had a fun time... 

so yeah thats my plans and stuff.

Like omg wow! Im am like the SHIT! I found a ocean front hotel on St Augustine beach, for new years eve, $170!!!!! its a 2 story town house with jacuzzi, fridge, balcony and stuff! yeah so liz and I are going to party there new years eve. were going 50/50 on the room. intrested in comeing? IM me ^_^_^_^_^

I feel like Im running out of time.

I had a dream where I forgot all but the last hour of it or so, pretty much I was setting the table for my mother, and then we had dinner (with someone else though I forget who) and then I was clearing the table. She was old, but not that old. Older is the best way to put it. I asked her if she rememebr the last tiem she had dinner with her family growing up. we started to talk about her brother, and in the dream he was like 80. I never met him. we talk on the phone, and corresponded, but we never met. 

the dream it self was depressing cause it was about things ending. time going. im loseing.

so HR called me todaya dn FINNALLY told me what my raise is... 4%, so rought $20-40 extra dollars on teh pay stub.

speaking of work im about to find myself in some MAJOR drama... and unwillingly too.

see emily was suppose to get the postion I have now, beofore me... they told her she had to be on loan for 90 days then she has it. 60 days into it and Im offer the same thing. less then a month into it im offered the job. there were two postings... one for a rep who moved 2 levels up (thats the one emily posted for) and the otehr was promted to a diffrent department (the one i posted for) the one who went 2 levels up had to do the 90 day loan, which means technically the position emily and I both were on laon for wouldnt be free till he was posted into his new job, while the other rep, the one i was replaceing was already free. result? i got the job before her, even though she was there longer then me. I havnt told anyone other then kristeen about this promotion cause of that fact.

the drama thickens. we found out last week that 2 people will be moved back one level (not a demotion in pay) now logically you would think I would be one of these people sense im the newest, and this other girl who is still on loan who hasnt even posted for the job yet. but word on the street is it will be the girl just mentioned... and emily. even emily suspects this though shes doesnt know (for sure atleast) about me being offically in the department. 

I ask her today why she thought I wouldnt be one... she said cause I was skips favorite (the manager) ... shit >< so when all comes out, and if emily is the one who gets bump, with no pay raise, nothing, im going to look like an ass, like i brown noised my way into what should be her position! 

ohwell I didnt do anything like that.. I did my job, and I did it good.... I have alot of pressure on top of me. see I KNOW my manager pulled strings to get me this... without me asking, hinting or anything to sujest i wanted it. BUT hes on top of me, I have to keep my numbers with the rest if not above the rest (as i was in the job 2 levels down from mine now) or he has heat from his manager which comes down onto me.

fun stuff right? well this office im in has more politics in it then the white hosue im sure... adn as much as you try to avoid it, your sucked in.

i have decided toast top with preserves and peanut butter is a delectsie meant to be savored ^_^

stupid people broke the main water line in my complex. no water at all anywhere near by. and today was laundry day too! looks like ill be breaking out the granny undies.

wheeee another work week/ *falls down*

well its not THAT bad. 

got a feeling this week will fly by... next weekend is laborday weekend. Ill probally be at my parents house saturday night, still no word if im able to goto Liz party sunday. 

this weeks goal! I will NOT eat ANY deserts. seriosuly this is like a BIG problem of mine. fallen into the habit of haveing a mid afternoon snack thast usually cake/pie/icecream so forth. this si BAD.. at least when its EVERY day ^^' 

this last weekend was fun. I woke yesturday and everyone already left. no surprise. its liek teh 2nd time i slept in after partying... all teh way till 10am! heh yeah thats sleeping in for me ^^' so i called rach up a couple hours later and we spent our day at her pool. saw lilo and stitch for teh first tiem too! cute movie.

wheeee

ok so hung out with cliff chris and josh. saw medallion. its was a blah movie.. few good sceans, thats it. then we went to teh mall, then thats that. 

tammy tracy rachel heather and sean are on there way. were just gonna chill.

maybe MAYBE have a ride to liz sunday party next week. the "porn adn chicken" party, not based on the movie. see what happens with taht...

im haveing fun again! yay!

Shakey, shakey. Parkinson's patients keep inviting you to join their community and you don't know why. I'll tell you why: you're too damn high strung for your own good. Chill out, yo.

ROFLOL!!!! obviously its being carcastic ^_^ I mean it hit the nail on the head with bran and cliff....

My LiveJournal Sitcom
Being lilacpearl (CBS, 2:30): lilacpearl (Buddy Ebsen) tells guambabe671 (Dave Coulier) about Scientology. That night, geckosan (Stephen Baldwin) and slurpeeboy20 (Michael Keaton) build a shed at the dentist's office. Nearby, nanakashimada (Leonard Nimoy) draws a picture on julieland2 (Sammy Davis Jr.)'s forehead. The next day, niner (Sam Neill) takes thesixswords (Mike Myers) bowling. On the other side of town, shuichishindou (Sharon Stone) overhears prettydumdum (Brittany Murphy) talking about continental drift. TV-MA.
What's Your LiveJournal Sitcom? (by rfreebern)

I dont know. I appriciate it when my friends look out for me.... I hope they assume I would do the same for them. but to demand repayment? ok maybe yeah it was in jest, and yeah you are upset about the events that happen outside our friendship... but hell i was going to find a way to thank ya... but to flat out tell me i owe you lunch for gas? as if its required? yeah i was put off by that... not angry or anything... but annoyed. not to mention i was still flustered over being scared i was about to be robbed, while i was naked >< lol.. um yeah look thats just my side, I understand yours... normally when you say something that puts me off I keep my mouth shut cause I know you mean well... but I guess under the situation I had to get that off my chest.

not sure what the point was to either of these... but im one for hopping on teh bandwagon ^_^

this morning i woke around 4am to what sounded like chirping. My first thought is dumbledore... go out but hes asleep. I walk around and I still here. then I think... shit not again! another stupid bird is trapped in my bathroom vent????? well its 4am and I cant do squaat about it. i barry my head under the pillows and covers and sleep for another hour. wake up. still here chirping. walk in teh bethroom.... strange I dont really here it in there. walk in my bed room and I heere it. I think... it cant be in the air vent... could it? well after peeking in and seeing nothing but hearing a cloud chirping, I turn off my fan... and the chirping stops ><


yeah i felt stupid. lol. but seriously jsut over a year ago a bird really DID get stuck adn died in my bath air vent. maintance REFUSED to come up durring the weekend... apparently a decaying animle is not consider a health hazard... that or the office didnt believe me. the guy that showed up monday sure didnt.... till he had to wipe up the body fluids... yeah yuk. had a garbage bag tack around it the whole weekend with CONSTANT air freshner.

jsut thought I would share that ^_^_^_^

sooooooo i rode my bike to work... takes about 15/25 min. what gets me is the over pass... and the up part of it ^^'was late to step but I can forgive myself sense i already did about 10 min cardio just getting there ^^'

kristeen a coworker of mine needed to use my computer to look for jobs/apartmetns up in philly. shes moveing back there cause her family and everythign she knows is there and shes haveing a shitty time down here.well she doesnt drive either (doh)so the plan was for me to ride my bike, her catch the slightly later bus, and jsut incase she did pass me I gave her the key to my apartment. well i got there before her, and soon after it started to down poor. then it dawns on me.. omg she has no clue how to navigate this place! so I throw on bum clothes, an old jacka dn a plastic bag... walk... no SWIM to teh bus stop... and wait. and wait. and wait. and wait. shit 15 min, the bus should of been tehre 20 min ago. why hasnt she called. I call her. no anwser. ok ok now what? i text her. nothing. try calling again, picks up and hangs up... shit! so I go back to the apartment... wet to the boan. a miss call! how in gods name did that happen. its her... shes lost >< but not for long..jsut when I was about to rush out and find her, she was right by my building... with an umbrella to boot. arg! 

ok so that was my adventure today.

tomorrow I might not get to start weight training... my instructor and her kid jsut got hired by publix to do a commerical in tampa. shes PLANNING on being there for the appoinment.. but well yeah....

oooh has anone else heard of rachel farris????? the only song I can find by her is "im not the girl"... which OWNS. yeah but anyone else heard her??? 

ok off to bed for me haha!

I dont think I have had such an uneventful weekend sense sophmore year! LIke the football gane friday was the 1 saving grace from a complete nothingness. 

though made some plans , but turns out it was a wash. 

dear lord... stupid friends with stupid jobs and stupid boyfriends... ALL OF THEM ^^'

well today I start work adn Im looking forward to it just to do soemthing other then nothing. Also have step class.

god im a fool....

im pathetic...

what ever amde me think maybe?

lesson learned... ill wake tomorrow stonrger then today

and Im the only one out of my circle of friends who is home... w no life! arrrrrr

maybe I should get a b/f jsut so if I cant chill w friends I can always resort to him *sigh*

Oh blah, blah blah blah? blahblah blahblah bllah. BLAH

ok that was random. 

talk to liz about soemthing... didnt think I would tlak to anyone about it... but doing so has made me feel betetr ^_^ I like being able to put everything out on the table and the person Im sharing with is real with me.. no unnesosary harshness, but no sugar coating. 

I have decided that Im going to ride my bike to work for now on... saves monies on teh bus ^_^ yeah and that means more movement , burns more cals, builds more muscle. speaking of that... I start weight training tuesday ^_^ Ive been going to teh gym 5 days a week now, 3 days focus on cardio (about 40 min worth) and the other two working on abs and the treadmill. probally already mention all that beofre but im bored and all I have to do now (cause im a loser at HOME all ALONE on a saturday night ><) is type in this LJ... phooy.

Im gonna have access to a new LJ code here soon... maybe i should make a new journal.. perhaps bother to type correctly and spell check? naw... lol

hmmmm ok ill stop wasting space...

after 2 failed attemps, I finnaly catch teh bus. went to target and bought myself a 18 speed bike... pretty spiffy ya know. anyways I rode it back home (about3-4 miles nothing major) and thats pretty much all I have done! and probally all I will do :(

hmmm im wanting some kfc... im gonna rest up first. its hot as hell out there today... taht and the humidity... I dont care how long you live in Fl... youll never be fully use to it ... *passes out from heat exhaustion*

so like My cell phone is a piece of SHIT... going to buy a new one this weekend ^_^

Rach call my house phone up and said she had an extra ticket to teh Jaguars firt home game... so I went to teh first football game EVER... andnit was the second game I watch period, ever ^_^ Actually had a blast ^_^ teh last quarter was kick ass... like I understood what was happening.... but Im not sure I could give an acurate replay ^^' at any rate we kick ass... final score 27/23 ^_^ I dont think it change... we left with like just over a min on the clock, and the ball was still ours....

ok yeah looks like I have another uneventful weekend. Tammy will be in daytona, and rach will be working and with her b/f. *sigh* I need to MOVE change.. do something. Maybe goto Tampa... tehy got a citibank sigh down there now. Other choices would be alberquercie (sp?) NM, and kansis city. God How i jsut want a empty my account (especially after todays check) grab a car, any car as long as it runs, pack a couple shirts, pair jeans, couple pairs undies... simlpe foord... and take off. just go. See where I end up when I have to stop. 

oooh! and if thing go well.. sean adn I will be room mates in a riverside apartment ^_^ He was casual talking about how he wanted to move out, but needs a room mate and his #1 choice was chris... but chris seems to never be ready. So im like... hell Ill be your room mate (save monies on rent ^_^) we talk about it... but i wasnt sure if he was seriosuly wanting to move... well last night he ask me if I was being serious.. and im like hell yeah! so when my lease is up Ill be packing ^_^

god I use to many of those stupid faces.

God it sucks.. do i not ahve ANY friends left in theis god forsaken place! And the ones that are my firends... there all stuck up there boy friends asses. Arg! Am I the only person alive that doesnt WANT a relationship? that the idea of being with somenoe constantly sickens me? I dont know... I guess im jsut fucked up. 

Speaking of being fucked up.. looks like i ruined another good friendship. well it use to be good. I dont know. One thing I have learned in the last 6 years.. people dont stick around. I think I might finnally harden myself enough to not be so freaking open with everyone. Im tired of investing trust and emotions into something thats just going to leave me. 

blah. I sound over dramtic and sappy. I need to get over myself.

>< darnit! the group pic after dinner with dade at afo is like THE worst pic EVER! i mean its blurry as fuck... and for crying out loud it was taken with a brand new digitle camera w lcd screen to preview!

I might of griped about this before..if so ill do it again! ^_^

why is it ill look in a mirror and I think well damn! I look hot! and then I look at ANY picture taken of me, and Im like... thats not what I saw in the mirror....

arg I hate not being photoginic... but ohwell I suppose Ill get over it,.

next week I start weight trainig... weee! lots of fun to be have im sure. I might starting working tuesday nights too... coworker needs the day hours that day cause hes takeing a night course.

Plans for AWA seem to be unfolding. I still ahev the room. decided im going  to pay for the majority of it considering I didnt really credit anyone back the afo hotle money when they gave me that discount ^^"  ... so yeah Im going to throw down $100 of my hard earn money (lol)  and hope I get enough ppl other then liz/chris and josh to room with me ^^' im sure I can pull that off though ...

ummm hrmmm... I want to goto the beach! Im still pasty... I need more sun. maybe im jsut addicted.

brandy had to canceal out on plans to ang today (well not so much plans as just routine) so she can afford to teach her cat how to use the toilett... told her if she really does succede in 6 months tiime, Ill buy her dinner where ever.

oh blah im bored.

arg... well Its gone ^_^_^_^ kinda of a mini spy adventure though... seeing I had like 5 min from startup before it would shut down... and EVERYTHING was takeing forever to load >< but after 3 attempts i won yay!

god i was soooo bored last night... went to bed at 8!!! freaking lame... but yeah at least im rested. Im trying to work 2 hours OT at work each day... so yeah.

ok thats all I have to update ^_^

well I susrived yesturday amzingly well... didnt crash till I got home around 5;30... woke up at 8 long enough to turn off most the lights, and didnt wake again till 4 am... where I jstu lasid in bed for an hour wishing I was still asleep, though Im not really tired.

well its all but official... Im going to ahve the job position Im on loan for... HR call thursday. we keep missing each other but my manager has already imformed me.... yay pay raise! I wonder how much... hmm. Anyways sense I miss the first 2 productive days of work Im apx $150k behind the team >< this pisses me off. True I only have to collect 80% of the goal cause its my first full month... but arg! to be this far behind!!!!! ohwell... ill catch up ^_^

been thinking about working nights... thing is I wont be able to attend my gym classes if I do that *sigh* so I guess I should stay days....

ok enough pointless rambling.

I didnt get to bed till 130am this morning...

I now must attend step class, and then work ><

lol ohwell... Ill nap when I get home ^_^

tammy and rachel came over last night. grabbed some kfc and rented a couple movies. darkness falls was ok.... alot better then halloween reserection ><

well tammy just left... finnally got my laundry done hurray! 

god im bored... I wonder what rachel is doing today....
are we hanging today? call my cell if we are ^_^
i try calling like 4 times through out the day... henever picked up, nor return my call... guess i pissed him off again?

well after loseing a total of 14 lb and gaining 5 back on vacation, i have broken down and am saying screw the diet! Im going to jsut eat healthy.... i will still cut out unessisary sugars... heck ill even avoid pointless carbs... but im not going to deprive myself of food i want... ill jsut limit myself. besides im doing 40/50 min cardio 3 times a week, and i doo strengh training 5 days a week.... as long as i eat healthy and smart i wont gain... and I look good at the size im at anyways. I jsut need to firm and tone up, which is what im working on now ^_^

another thing im changing is my party habbits. after this last weekend, and thinking about previous weekends... I need to lighten up my drinking by alot... getting piss drunk once in awhile is ok, only when im with close friends though. mainly im going to stick to mix drinks and maults (instead of straight shots) no im not ashamed of anything I have done thus far... though im going to now make sure ill never do anything I may be ashamed of later.

Im really getting into love hina... alex gave me the first 2 mangas in the series... and its sooo fun! must buy more ^_^

working is doing good... busting my ass and its paying off. though I have to admit I HATE it when the slackers whine. it really irates me. thing is kristeen is a "friend" 9translation a person I talk to at work) and she is one of the whiners... one of her big gripes is that she nor anyone else from this managers team she was on last year got their annual rais... cause they didnt meet their numbers. shes saying 9along with everyone on the team0 that its not thier fault cause their manager sucked and didnt supply the info needed to know where they were on the matrix, or was there to "manage" them and not let them get away with everything. um excuse me? but hello! if you work, then youll meet your numbers.. thats that. you shouldnt need a manager to hold your hand and tell you not to talk off the phones 4 hours out of an 8 hour shift. and now that these people are on a managers team that DOES inform them of their numbers, and make sure they arnt fooling around, and yes micro manages 9which is bad but hey it could be worse) they are bitching about that too ><

im one out of maybe 5 people on the team that really like our manager... hes awsome! hes bussiness orinted... sees facts, and if you want him to see your point of view you have to present facts. i respect this. this is a kind of person that SHOULD manage a team. unfortantly though when people dont get their way, they bitch. also they forget the fact that he has people above him that are pulling his strings... not all the 'bs" we are told to go through is his doing... but above him! erg corprate politics... i cant stand people who is in corprate america and dont get you have to play the game if you expect to get anywhere. take me for example... I dont kiss anyones ass... but my numbers are the best...well one of the best ^^' and im not micro managed (for the most part) the people whose numbers SUCk are micro manage, and yes he gets onto them.. cause he has heat over him about why those members of his team are sucking...

ok ok i need to stop ranitng.... but seeing how i never rant about my job.. or hell even talk about it im sure yall forgive me this time ^_^

blah im bored...

worked 2 hours ot today ^_^

um yeah.... noting much to write about...

I have 915 audio files totaling 61 hours 27 minuets 51+ sec.......

wow

yeah well back to the grind for me... I dont think im going to take a weeks vacation next year... this havein to get reuse to working and responsabilities is sucking ><

lately I have been kinda wishing I could jsut lt it all go... do as I please, go where I want, say what I will, and  do as I wish... But im scared tha once I do that, in a couple years time I will grow bored with that as well and its better to have a future and be bored, then not to have a future and be bored... so I will stay on the course I have placed myself.

*yawn* wow... i slept alot today ^^" 

lets see, crashed 7pm last night, woke at 11, fell asleep again 1115, woke at 12ish to a telemarketeer, fell asleep tll 1, woke, sat around, took a bath, fell asleep THERE, woke, went to bed till like 4 pm.

dad came and drop off my bird ^_^ missed my dum dum ^_^ bought a new phone charger and order a new usb cord for the cam. 

for those that dont know my good friend <a href="http://www.livejournal.com/users/branchan/"> branchan, go to her LJ to get a real update about my/our vacation ^_^

okies okies, wow... what a week. 

last sunday brandy and I headed to ft lauderdale to catch the discovery for the Bahamas. 4 1/2-5 hours on board and we were there. they have awsome taxies... well the one we had to take to the hotle was, it was a very old style limo from like the 70s or something. Bran was kinda freaked out about hat lol ^^"

room was bigger then I plan, and the grounds what I expected. food was wat over priced, though the fast food was better quality there then here. 

For my bday bran paid for the glass bottom boat tour. lots of fun. I was the only one who DIDNT see the shark *sigh*

well thursday night we got back to ft lauderdale, and room w/ alex and juan. Alex gave me the first 2 love hina mangas for my bday ^_^

friday we made it to the con. Got to meet sam wich was groovy. It was also kick ass to hang with everyone too ^_^ 

saturday the fuji cfrew who was in attendance hung out w dade at this spors bar with kick ass nachos ^_^ went w liz to get her tatoo of lust done. 

that night was the "party" ... yeah alot of people i didnt know, and none of them of very much importanse in the con community. after the 2nd time security was called on us I baiscly told everyone I didnt know to get out.. yeah i was loud too but Im not going to kick myself out of my own room >< I dont know I wasnt to happy w the "party" though I DID have fun. went swimming that night and jsut talk to people. 

sunday well taht would be today. said bye to everyone and headed home w/cliff. manage to have left my 2 new shot glasses, phone charger, adn usb cord for the cam at the hotle.... the one in orlando free port or fortlauderdale I just dont know....
